General.Name: Shanghai Geoharbour Construction Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Geoharbour Construction Group Co., Ltd. engages in the geotechnical engineering survey, design, construction, and monitoring services in China and internationally. The company's services include foundation treatment, pile foundation engineering, and other services. It undertakes airports, ports, highways, railways, power plants, municipalities, petrochemicals, national defense, land reclamation, and other projects. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Shanghai, China.
